answers.answer: I have the same issue. My dr sent me In for ekg, non stress test, and blood work. I have issues w tachycardia,  but they aren't sure why. It isn't effecting the baby, so she isn't super worried about it, I just have to monitor myself and stay away from anything w Caffeine in it.  When it happens to me I get dizzy, hot, nauseous and short of breath.  I'll lay down w a fan on me on my left side or run my hands under cold water to help. But my resting heart rate jumps between 115 and 150. Have you discussed it w your ob?
I have not had this happen to me. I would try make a log of time it happened, your heart rate, what you were doing, and how long it lasted. If it persists throughout the day I would call my ob.
I had that problem with my first child, and my blood pressure was a little high, so my doctor made me do a 24 hour pee test, and I ended up having preeclampsia.

question: Im 35 weeks and 6 days. I keep having trouble breathing and my heart randomly speeds up for about 2-3 mintues. Anyone else experiencing this or knows what i should do?
title: question ladies.
